TneTabControl Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
AddSidebarControl(TControl,TneSibebarControlPosition)

Adds a control to one of the two sidebars

AddTab(string)

Overloaded. Adds a tab in the TabControl with the default TabItem and no Frame

AddTab(string,TneTabItem)

Overloaded. Adds a tab in the TabControl without a Frame

AddTab(string,TneTabItem,TFrame)

Overloaded. Represents method AddTab(string,TneTabItem,TFrame).

DeleteAllTabs(Boolean)

Deletes all the tabs

DeleteSidebarControl(Integer,TneSibebarControlPosition)

Represents method DeleteSidebarControl(Integer,TneSibebarControlPosition).

DeleteTab(string,Boolean)

Deletes the tab with the specific tag

GetControl(string)

Represents method GetControl(string).

GetFrame(string)

Represents method GetFrame(string).

GetSidebarControl(Integer,TneSibebarControlPosition)

Represents method GetSidebarControl(Integer,TneSibebarControlPosition).

GetSidebarControlCount(TneSibebarControlPosition)

Represents method GetSidebarControlCount(TneSibebarControlPosition).

GetTab(string)

Represents method GetTab(string).

GetTabItemsList(TList)

Generates a list of TneTabItems sorted based on the index, ie. the way they appear in the tabcontrol

GetTag(Integer)

Represents method GetTag(Integer).

GetTagList(TStringList)

Returns the list of the tabs in the order they appear in the tab control

InsertTab(string,integer)

Overloaded. Inserts a tab in the TabControl with the default TabItem and no Frame in the tabIndex position

InsertTab(string,integer,TneTabItem)

Overloaded. Inserts a tab in the TabControl without a Frame in the tabIndex positiob

InsertTab(string,integer,TneTabItem,TFrame)

Overloaded. Represents method InsertTab(string,integer,TneTabItem,TFrame).

RefreshControl(string)

Overloaded. Refreshes the control of the tab. Must be called everytime the ControlToShow is altered

RefreshTabHeight(string)

Overloaded. Refreshes the control and adjusts the tab height.

SaveTabs(TExportElements,TSetOfStrings,TStringList)

Returns the number of the tabs

ToggleVisible(Boolean,TneSibebarControlPosition)

Represents method ToggleVisible(Boolean,TneSibebarControlPosition).
